question: Which state is not under Inner Line Permit?
explanation: The inner line permit (ILP) regime was extended to Manipur on December 11,2019 with President Ram Nath Kovind signing the order in this effect. Earlier it is applicable to Arunachal Pradesh, Nagaland,Mizoram.The decision comes two days after Union Home Minister Amit Shah announced in the Lok Sabha that the inner line permit would be extended to Manipur to allay the fears of the people of the northeastern state about the contentious Citizenship (Amendment) Bill, 2019.A notification in this regard was issued by the Home Ministry.To visit the inner line permit-regime states, outsiders, including people from other states of the country, need to take permission.
